compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
requirements.evidence: Consent mechanisms are in place but need improvement.
gaps: Lack of clear consent management system.
recommendations: Implement a robust consent management platform.

requirements.requirement: Ensure data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure).
requirements.evidence: No formal process for handling data subject requests.
gaps: Absence of documented procedures for data subject rights.
recommendations: Establish a process for managing data subject requests.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some security controls are in place but not comprehensive.
gaps: Limited integration of privacy considerations in development.
recommendations: Adopt a privacy-by-design approach in development processes.

critical_gaps: Lack of a formal data protection officer (DPO).
Insufficient documentation of data processing activities.
remediation_plan: Appoint a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to oversee compliance.
Develop and document processes for data subject rights.
